options.option: DISABLED - Do not perform replica sync checking
ENABLED - Enabled, but do not display individual progress to user
ENABLED and Display - Enable replica sync checking and display progress to user
Match first user - Use first user discovered in any context or profile, ignore any duplicates
Match first ldap profile - Use the first user discovered in the first profile that has only a single match
No duplicates Permitted - Fail whenever duplicate users are found in any context or profile
Show the ldap profile and ldap contexts

setting.regex: Follow LDAP Referrals. Not typically required.

default.value: {"to":"@User:Email@","from":"Change Password Notice \u003c@DefaultEmailFromAddress@\u003e","subject":"Password Change Notification","bodyPlain":"You have changed your password. If you did not initiate a password change please contact your help desk immediately.","bodyHtml":"\u003cb\u003eYou have changed your password.\u003c/b\u003e If you have changed your password, then no action is required. If you did not initiate a password change please contact your help desk."}

{"to":"@User:Email@","from":"Change Password Notice \u003c@DefaultEmailFromAddress@\u003e","subject":"Password Change Notification","bodyPlain":"Your password has been changed by the heldesk. You should set a new password immediately. If you did not initiate a password change please contact your helpdesk.","bodyHtml":"\u003cb\u003eYour password has been changed by the helpdesk.\u003c/b\u003e You should set a new password immediately. If you did not initiate a password change please contact your helpdesk."}

{"to":"@User:Email@","from":"Profile Update \u003c@DefaultEmailFromAddress@\u003e","subject":"Profile Update","bodyPlain":"Thank you for updating your profile information, @LDAP:givenName@.","bodyHtml":"\u003cb\u003eThank you for updating your profile information, \u003c/b\u003e\u003cb\u003e@LDAP:givenName@.\u003c/b\u003e"}

{"to":"@User:Email@","from":"New User Registration \u003c@DefaultEmailFromAddress@\u003e","subject":"Welcome","bodyPlain":"Thank you for registering your account, @LDAP:givenName@.","bodyHtml":"\u003cb\u003eThank you for registering your account, \u003c/b\u003e\u003cb\u003e@LDAP:givenName@.\u003c/b\u003e"}

{"to":"@User:Email@","from":"Activation Notification \u003c@DefaultEmailFromAddress@\u003e","subject":"Account Activated","bodyPlain":"Thank you for activating your account, @LDAP:givenName@.","bodyHtml":"\u003cb\u003eThank you for activating your account, @LDAP:givenName@.\u003c/b\u003e"}

{"to":"@User:Email@","from":"Helpdesk \u003c@DefaultEmailFromAddress@\u003e","subject":"Helpdesk Verification","bodyPlain":"Your helpdesk has sent you a code to verify your identity. Your verification code is:\n\n%TOKEN%","bodyHtml":"Your helpdesk has sent you a code to verify your identity. Your verification code is: %TOKEN%."}

{"to":"@User:Email@","from":"Guest Registration Agent \u003c@DefaultEmailFromAddress@\u003e","subject":"Account update notification","bodyPlain":"Your account has been updated.","bodyHtml":"\u003cb\u003eYour account has been created.\u003c/b\u003e"}

{"to":"@User:Email@","from":"Intruder Notifier \u003c@DefaultEmailFromAddress@\u003e","subject":"Password Information","bodyPlain":"Your account has been temporarily disabled due to several incorrect login/password reset attempts. If this activity was not caused by you, please contact your administrator.","bodyHtml":"Your account has been temporarily disabled due to several incorrect login/password reset attempts. If this activity was not caused by you, please contact your administrator."}

options.option: Request - Authentication will be part of the request
CSV - Escape for comma separated values
Javascript - recommended for JSON formatted documents
SQL - turn single-quotes (') into double single-quotes ('')
URL - recommended for GET requests and POST with form data (default)
XML - for XML and/or SOAP services
Plain - country code (e.g. 1 for USA) plus subscriber number (e.g. 12312345): 112312345
Plus - Same as plain, but with a plus sign as a prefix: +112312345
Zeros - Same as plain, but prefixed with a double zero: 00112312345

default.value: Thank you for activating your account.

options.option: None - Do not enforce AD Complexity Rules
Force Setup - but allow user to skip
Auto Configure - Database if configured, LDAP otherwise

default.value: {"text":"What is the name of the main character in your favorite book?","minLength":4,"maxLength":200,"adminDefined":true,enforceWordlist:true,maxQuestionCharsInAnswer:3}
{"text":"What is the name of your favorite teacher?","minLength":4,"maxLength":200,"adminDefined":true,enforceWordlist:true,maxQuestionCharsInAnswer:3}
{"text":"What is the name of your favorite pet?","minLength":4,"maxLength":200,"adminDefined":true,enforceWordlist:true,maxQuestionCharsInAnswer:3}
{"text":"What was the name of your childhood best friend?","minLength":4,"maxLength":200,"adminDefined":true,enforceWordlist:true,maxQuestionCharsInAnswer:3}
{"text":"What was your favorite show as a child?","minLength":4,"maxLength":200,"adminDefined":true,enforceWordlist:true,maxQuestionCharsInAnswer:3}
{"text":"If you could meet someone from history, who would it be?","minLength":4,"maxLength":200,"adminDefined":true,enforceWordlist:true,maxQuestionCharsInAnswer:3}
{"text":"What is your least favorite film of all time?","minLength":4,"maxLength":200,"adminDefined":true,enforceWordlist:true,maxQuestionCharsInAnswer:3}
{"text":"Quel est le nom du personnage principal de votre livre prfr?","minLength":4,"maxLength":200,"adminDefined":true,enforceWordlist:true,maxQuestionCharsInAnswer:3}
{"text":"Quel est le nom de votre professeur prfr?","minLength":4,"maxLength":200,"adminDefined":true,enforceWordlist:true,maxQuestionCharsInAnswer:3}
{"text":"Quel est le nom de votre animal prfr?","minLength":4,"maxLength":200,"adminDefined":true,enforceWordlist:true,maxQuestionCharsInAnswer:3}
{"text":"Quel tait le nom de votre meilleur ami d'enfance?","minLength":4,"maxLength":200,"adminDefined":true,enforceWordlist:true,maxQuestionCharsInAnswer:3}
{"text":"Quel a t votre mission prfre comme un enfant?","minLength":4,"maxLength":200,"adminDefined":true,enforceWordlist:true,maxQuestionCharsInAnswer:3}
{"text":"Si vous pouviez rencontrer quelqu'un de l'histoire, ce serait qui?","minLength":4,"maxLength":200,"adminDefined":true,enforceWordlist:true,maxQuestionCharsInAnswer:3}
{"text":"Quel est ton film prfr moins de tous les temps?","minLength":4,"maxLength":200,"adminDefined":true,enforceWordlist:true,maxQuestionCharsInAnswer:3}
{"text":"Quels sont les aliments que vous aimez le plus?","minLength":4,"maxLength":200,"adminDefined":true,enforceWordlist:true,maxQuestionCharsInAnswer:3}
{"text":"Hoe heet de hoofdpersoon in uw favoriete boek?","minLength":4,"maxLength":200,"adminDefined":true,enforceWordlist:true,maxQuestionCharsInAnswer:3}
{"text":"Hoe heette uw beste vriend(in) uit uw jeugd?","minLength":4,"maxLength":200,"adminDefined":true,enforceWordlist:true,maxQuestionCharsInAnswer:3}
{"text":"Wat was uw favoriete TV-programma in uw jeugd?","minLength":4,"maxLength":200,"adminDefined":true,enforceWordlist:true,maxQuestionCharsInAnswer:3}
{"text":"In welke stad of plaats bent u geboren?","minLength":4,"maxLength":200,"adminDefined":true,enforceWordlist:true,maxQuestionCharsInAnswer:3}
{"text":"Als u een historisch persoon zou kunnen ontmoeten, wie zou dat zijn?","minLength":4,"maxLength":200,"adminDefined":true,enforceWordlist:true,maxQuestionCharsInAnswer:3}
{"text":"Wie hie Ihr bester Freund/Ihre beste Freundin aus der Kindheit?","minLength":4,"maxLength":200,"adminDefined":true,enforceWordlist:true,maxQuestionCharsInAnswer:3}
{"text":"Welche Sendung haben Sie als Kind am liebsten angeschaut?","minLength":4,"maxLength":200,"adminDefined":true,enforceWordlist:true,maxQuestionCharsInAnswer:3}
{"text":"In welcher Strae haben Sie als Kind gewohnt?","minLength":4,"maxLength":200,"adminDefined":true,enforceWordlist:true,maxQuestionCharsInAnswer:3}
{"text":"Wie heit der schlechteste Film, den Sie je gesehen haben?","minLength":4,"maxLength":200,"adminDefined":true,enforceWordlist:true,maxQuestionCharsInAnswer:3}
{"text":"Wie hie der Lehrer, den Sie am wenigsten mochten?","minLength":4,"maxLength":200,"adminDefined":true,enforceWordlist:true,maxQuestionCharsInAnswer:3}
{"text":"Cul es el nombre del personaje principal de su libro favorito?","minLength":4,"maxLength":200,"adminDefined":true,enforceWordlist:true,maxQuestionCharsInAnswer:3}
{"text":"Cul es el nombre de su profesor favorito?","minLength":4,"maxLength":200,"adminDefined":true,enforceWordlist:true,maxQuestionCharsInAnswer:3}
{"text":"Cul es el nombre de su mascota favorita?","minLength":4,"maxLength":200,"adminDefined":true,enforceWordlist:true,maxQuestionCharsInAnswer:3}
{"text":"Cmo se llamaba su mejor amigo del colegio?","minLength":4,"maxLength":200,"adminDefined":true,enforceWordlist:true,maxQuestionCharsInAnswer:3}
{"text":"Cul era su programa de televisin favorito cuando era nio?","minLength":4,"maxLength":200,"adminDefined":true,enforceWordlist:true,maxQuestionCharsInAnswer:3}
{"text":"Cul es el nombre de la calle en la que se cri?","minLength":4,"maxLength":200,"adminDefined":true,enforceWordlist:true,maxQuestionCharsInAnswer:3}
{"text":"Si pudiera conocer a algn personaje histrico, quin sera?","minLength":4,"maxLength":200,"adminDefined":true,enforceWordlist:true,maxQuestionCharsInAnswer:3}
{"text":"Cul es la pelcula que menos le gusta?","minLength":4,"maxLength":200,"adminDefined":true,enforceWordlist:true,maxQuestionCharsInAnswer:3}
{"text":"Quin era el profesor que menos le gustaba?","minLength":4,"maxLength":200,"adminDefined":true,enforceWordlist:true,maxQuestionCharsInAnswer:3}
{"text":"Cul es la comida que menos le gusta?","minLength":4,"maxLength":200,"adminDefined":true,enforceWordlist:true,maxQuestionCharsInAnswer:3}
{"text":"Qual o nome do personagem principal do seu livro favorito?","minLength":4,"maxLength":200,"adminDefined":true,enforceWordlist:true,maxQuestionCharsInAnswer:3}
{"text":"Qual o nome do seu animal de estimao favorito?","minLength":4,"maxLength":200,"adminDefined":true,enforceWordlist:true,maxQuestionCharsInAnswer:3}
{"text":"Qual era o nome do seu melhor amigo de infncia?","minLength":4,"maxLength":200,"adminDefined":true,enforceWordlist:true,maxQuestionCharsInAnswer:3}
{"text":"Qual era seu programa de TV favorito quando criana?","minLength":4,"maxLength":200,"adminDefined":true,enforceWordlist:true,maxQuestionCharsInAnswer:3}
{"text":"Se voc pudesse conhecer algum da histria, quem seria?","minLength":4,"maxLength":200,"adminDefined":true,enforceWordlist:true,maxQuestionCharsInAnswer:3}
{"text":"Qual o filme de que voc menos gostou na vida?","minLength":4,"maxLength":200,"adminDefined":true,enforceWordlist:true,maxQuestionCharsInAnswer:3}
{"text":"Qual era o professor de quem voc menos gostava?","minLength":4,"maxLength":200,"adminDefined":true,enforceWordlist:true,maxQuestionCharsInAnswer:3}
{"text":"Qual a comida de que voc menos gosta?","minLength":4,"maxLength":200,"adminDefined":true,enforceWordlist:true,maxQuestionCharsInAnswer:3}
{"text":"Vad hette din bsta kompis nr du var barn?","minLength":4,"maxLength":200,"adminDefined":true,enforceWordlist:true,maxQuestionCharsInAnswer:3}
{"text":"Vilket var ditt favoritprogram p TV nr du var liten?","minLength":4,"maxLength":200,"adminDefined":true,enforceWordlist:true,maxQuestionCharsInAnswer:3}
{"text":"Om du kunde trffa en historisk person, vem skulle du vlja?","minLength":4,"maxLength":200,"adminDefined":true,enforceWordlist:true,maxQuestionCharsInAnswer:3}

options.option: Email Only - Send to email address
Both - Send token to both email and SMS
Email First - Try to send token via email; if no email address is available, send via SMS
SMS First - Try to send token via SMS; if no SMS number is available, send via email
User Choice - If both SMS and email address is available, user decides
Allow user to set new password
Send new password and mark as expired
Email Only - Send to email address
Both - Send token to both email and SMS
Email First - Try to send token via email; if no email address is available, send via SMS
SMS First - Try to send token via SMS; if no SMS number is available, send via email
Email Only - Send to email address
Both - Send token to both email and SMS
Email First - Try to send token via email; if no email address is available, send via SMS
SMS First - Try to send token via SMS; if no SMS number is available, send via email
None - Token verification will not be performed
Email Only - Send to email address
Both - Send token to both email and SMS
Email First - Try to send token via email; if no email address is available, send via SMS
SMS First - Try to send token via SMS; if no SMS number is available, send via email
Auto generate a list of random passwords to choose from
Auto generate a list of random passwords and allow typing of new password
Set the password to a random value unknown to the helpdesk operator
None - Token verification will not be available
Email Only - Send to email address
Both - Send token to both email and SMS
Email First - Try to send token via email; if no email address is available, send via SMS
SMS First - Try to send token via SMS; if no SMS number is available, send via email
Operator Choice - If both SMS and email address is available, helpdesk operator decides
